adviseScripts.text: Commander! You really don't want to mess with Poli today!
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: You see, I was working hard, as usual...
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: But Poli got mad at me! She was in such a bad mood, I just had to get out of there!
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: Now that I'm out of the office, I have no idea what to do! Any ideas?
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: Ask Poli to play with you.
Tell Poli you're sorry.
Great idea!
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: If Poli joins me, it may help her take a load off.
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: You're so smart, Commander!
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: I already tried that!
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: She's still fuming, though.
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: Looks like all I can do is go out and have fun on my own!
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: I explore ways to help with Miranda amuse herself.
Poli chewed me out because I said she reminds me of a puppy.
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: Should I have told her she's more like a cat instead?
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: Yes.
No.
You think so?
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: If you say so, then I'll go tell her right away!
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: I'm sure it'll make her happy!
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: So that's a no-go, too?
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: She's such a mystery...
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: I have a conversation with Miranda about Poli.
They say that nice weather can put you in a good mood.
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: I'm not sure how that works, though.
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: It's because rain is so inconvenient.
It doesn't. I'm in a bad mood even on beautiful days.
Hey, you're right!
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: It's better to work on a nice day than a rainy day!
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: Now I get it!
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: Really?
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: That's... not what I expected you to say...
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: Just forget I asked.
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: I have a discussion with Miranda about the relationship between weather and moods.
Today, while I was working my beat,
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: someone asked me if I was a new recruit.
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: They just knew! I didn't say anything and they already knew!
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: How could they have known?
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: You can tell just by looking at your face.
You can tell by the way you act.
My face? Do I have the face of a rookie?
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: That's weird... I don't think it's that obvious at all...
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: The way I act?
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: Well, it happened while I was directing traffic.
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: I heard that waiting in lines was the most efficient way to do things,
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: so I blocked the road and asked everyone to line up in a single file.
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: The other officers really gave me an earful!
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: I think that might be the reason why!
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: Miranda tells me more about the daily life of a rookie police officer.
Commander, do you ever wonder about the future?
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: I do. I wonder if I'll ever become an accomplished police officer.
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: I'm sure you will.
I wouldn't get your hopes up.
The fact that you trust me really gives me confidence!
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: I'll do my best!
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: I'm not saying it'll happen overnight or anything!
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: Anyway, if you're gonna dream, you gotta dream big!
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: What's wrong with that?
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: I chat with Miranda about how to become an accomplished police officer.
Commander, can I tell you something?
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: People always tell me I don't have to work so hard.
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: But, isn't working hard a good thing?
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: Not always.
Yes! Nothing in the world is more important than hard work!
Oh, really?
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: Well... I still want to work hard.
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: I thought so! I knew you would say that, Commander!
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: Thank you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: I won't let you down!
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: I work with Miranda to find ways for her to work even harder.
The safety of everyone inside the Ark is my responsibility.
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: I said that out loud today, and a boy on the street giggled!
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: He must have thought what I was telling a joke or something.
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: I don't see what's so funny about it!
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: Maybe it was because you were talking too loud.
It might be better not to know.
That's true. I was talking very loudly.
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: I guess I can see how that's a little funny.
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: Mystery solved. Thanks, Commander!
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: Wait, there are some things that it's better if you don't know?
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: *Sigh* There's so much I still don't understand about this world.
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: I listen to Miranda about her daily life at work.
I think, in order to become a good detective,
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: I'll need to work hard to improve myself.
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: What do you think I should work on first?
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: What about your intelligence?
Work on your resilience.
Why do I have to improve that?
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: I'm already a quick learner!
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: Now, that's really true!
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: I think that's a good idea.
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: Starting today, I'll work to improve my resilience.
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: I discuss self-improvement with Miranda.
Commander, I have a question.
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: People say that if you want to be successful, then you need to have a dream.
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: I'm not sure how successful I want to become, so do I need a dream?
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: How successful do you think I'll be?
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: You'll definitely climb to the top of the ladder.
When they say successful, they're talking about becoming a better person.
You think so?
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: That's a relief! ... I think?
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: Hm... Actually, I'm not so sure.
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: A better person?
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: Sounds kinda abstract, but also cool at the same time.
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: All right! I'll come up with a great dream right away!
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: I discuss potential dreams with Miranda.
Commander, I was watching TV today...
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: They said that if you want to be healthy, you have to eat well.
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: So... exactly how much do you have to eat to be healthy?
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: You have to put everything you've got into eating!
You're already eating well.
I understand.
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: I'll focus a lot more on eating from now on.
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: I'll push myself to the limit!
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: I'll dedicate myself entirely to eating!
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: I'll be the healthiest thing to ever live!
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: Are you sure it's enough?
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: On the TV, they said you should eat a lot...
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: Ugh, I'm confused.
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: I have a conversation with Miranda about eating and personal health.
Commander.
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: I'm going to fry some eggs for Poli today.
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: I wondering what design I should draw with the ketchup.
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: A cute puppy.
A traffic sign.
I drew a puppy last time, and you know what Poli did?
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: She growled at me.
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: I don't think it's a good idea to draw another one.
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: Very good idea, Commander!
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: I'll draw a "Careful, children at play" sign!
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: Miranda and I try and figure out what she should draw.
I want to make a song about traffic control that you can play on the roads.
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: I have some lyrics that I thought of.
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: I'm just not sure if I can actually pull off the singing...
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: Are you sure it wouldn't interfere with traffic?
I think it'd be wonderful if you sang it.
Oh, it'll interfere with the traffic?
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: I didn't think about that...
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: All right then, I'll put it on the back burner for now then.
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: You really think so?
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: It's a little embarrassing, but if I can do it...
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: I'd love to give it a try!
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: I'll ask Poli.
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: Miranda and I discuss her song.
I haven't managed traffic before on a snowy day,
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: but I think it will be fun!
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: I think I'll be staying off the roads on that day.
I'm sure it'll be a new experience for you.
Why not?
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: Is it because you think there will be a lot of delays?
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: You don't need to worry!
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: I'll make sure that traffic flows smoothly!
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: I'm sure it will be.
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: Figuring how to conduct traffic in snowy conditions
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: will help improve my ability to think on-the-fly.
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: I hope it snows soon.
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: Miranda and I talk about conducting traffic.
When I was on vacation,
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: traffic was at a complete standstill.
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: So I promptly sorted it all out, and came back here!
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: It was great seeing the looks of satisfaction on people's faces.
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: Are you sure you're remembering everything correctly?
Reporting for duty even while on vacation! Very impressive!
Of course I am!
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: I saw everyone smile with my own two eyes!
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: Please, you're making me blush!
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: I'm an Ark police officer,
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: so that was nothing!
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: Miranda told me more stories about conducting traffic.
The Outpost is such a peaceful place.
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: ... So peaceful that sometimes there's nothing to do!
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: I'm happy to come up with more work for you.
It's all thanks to your hard work.
Oh... um... about that...
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: That's okay.
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: I take back what I just said.
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: I'm happy you feel that way, Commander!
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: Hearing you say that makes me want to work even harder.
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: Feel free to call me if anything comes up.
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: Miranda and I talk about how peaceful the Outpost is.
I thought I'd worked long enough,
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: but my superiors still say I'm just a rookie!
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: What do I have to do to get rid of this stigma?
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: You need to see things from a broader perspective.
There's not much else you can do. You just have to accept it for now.
So what you're saying is...
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: I should go on top of a skyscraper so I can get a better view?
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: That way I'd be able to spot the criminals more easily!
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: Aw man...
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: In other people's eyes, Poli can do no wrong. It's infuriating!
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: I want to be like that too!
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: I speak with Miranda about the trials and tribulations of being a rookie police officer.
This is kind of a strange question,
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: but what do you think is a spy's strong suit?
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: What makes you ask a question like that?
Maintaining total secrecy.
Um... It just popped into my head randomly
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: when I was walking on the street.
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: No other reason! I'm not a spy or anything like that!
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: For sure!
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: It's paramount that a spy never reveals their identity.
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: Anyway, I'll keep doing my best with my own job!
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: Even though it was still vague, I got a slightly better idea of who Miranda was.
I practically fell apart yesterday after eating my lunch!
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: I thought about filing a maintenance request, but decided to just grit my teeth and push through.
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: Poli found out later though and got really upset with me...
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: Why do you think I got in trouble?
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: Managing your own condition is also a skill.
Because Poli cares about you.
Of course! How could I have been so foolish!
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: Of course, it was because of my lack of effort!
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: From now on, I'll be sure to look after myself more vigilantly once I'm finished with my work.
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: She has a strange way of showing it...she was growling at me and everything...
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: Anyway, I'll try and be nicer to Poli from now on.
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: Miranda and I talk about managing your personal health with professional obligations.
It's been a while since I last had time off of work.
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: I want everyone to know how much fun I'm having, but I'm not sure how to go about it...
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: Can you help me spread the word?
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: Is it really that important to you?
What exactly should I tell them?
Yes, it's extremely important to me!
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: Poli said that my time off is just as important as the time I spend on duty.
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: So I want everyone to know that I went all out with my R&R!
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: Say that you and I went somewhere and had a total blast!
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: ... Oh, come to think of it,
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: I forgot to mention this to you first...
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: We eventually got into a lively discussion about how Miranda should utilize her days off.
There's a restaurant near our office that's absolutely delicious.
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: I want to go with someone but I'm not sure how to ask them.
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: Lure them in with the idea of delicious food.
Play up the fact that they'll be going with you.
Gotcha, I'll try and let the food do the talking, so to speak!
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: Erm... So, this restaurant has two signature Splendamin dishes:
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: Udon noodles with butter, and al dente capellini noodles with salt.
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: Got it, I'll see what I can do!
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: Erm... So Commander,
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: I'd really like to take you to this restaurant, even if I end up spending my entire paycheck. Would you care to join me?
adviseScripts.speaker: Miranda

adviseScripts.text: I made an appointment to eat out with Miranda.
